Nodes.name: Maple
Nodes.text: Hey there! You must be Tom, right?

Nodes.name: Maple
Nodes.text: I'm not sure if Tortimer told you, but I'm Maple. It's nice to meet you!

Nodes.name: Maple
Nodes.text: Nice shop you have here too. When I was passing by on the train to visit my family, I saw you out here working.

Nodes.name: Maple
Nodes.text: I'm glad it came out so nice, and I am looking forward to seeing what you have for sale.

Nodes.name: Maple
Nodes.text: The convience of everything is going to be so nice too.

Nodes.name: Maple
Nodes.text: The convience of everything is going to be so nice too.

Nodes.name: Maple
Nodes.text: Also, I moved in on the far east side of town. So if you ever want to stop by, just head to the left and across the brigde.

Nodes.name: Maple
Nodes.text: Feel free to swing by anytime!
